name: Sameer Pai
blurb: In his free time, Sameer can usually be found playing volleyball, practicing his Japanese, or grinding rhythm games!

name: Grace Jau
blurb: Apart from singing, Grace loves crafting, puzzles, and collecting pressed pennies.

name: Josh Lee
blurb: Josh's favorite song is POP! by Nayeon.

name: Rachel Loh
blurb: Rachel likes to sing, dance, drink boba, listen to music, and spend time with her beloved sister.

name: Gilford Ting
blurb: You'll probably find Gilford either making terrible puns, reading, writing, teaching, optimizing miniscule everyday tasks (like opening doors), or procrastinating by having good conversations with friends! :D

name: Kevin Kwak
blurb: Kevin is probably either playing smash, gymming, listening to Ado (seriously she's so good), or learning some random skill that he decided to pick up for that month.

name: Nicholas Wei
blurb: Nicholas enjoys going on hikes, staring at plants and bugs, and embarrassing other Syncos in the hallways.

name: Sarah Park
blurb: If you hear someone singing down dorm row after sunset, it's probably Sarah. Other than that, she's always down for a snowball fight in the winter :)

name: Catherine Zhu
songs: Man Tian Xing Chen Bu Ji Ni
blurb: Catherine can often be found doing random things that probably aren't the best use of her time. But hey, who cares.

name: Kristine Lu
blurb: Besides singing, Kristine likes to play the piano, go on runs, and explore new places with friends.

name: Michelle Wei
blurb: Besides singing, Michelle enjoys playing volleyball, listening to music, and spending time with friends.
